title: Unusually high ping
body:
I've played at least **1 match** of league every day this week. My ping ranges from ***45-50ms.*** 

This has all changed since I started playing today (11/18/17). My ping is ranging from ***130-150*** and it never goes down to my usual ping.
It's playable but very frustrating as I'm not used to the cast time delays.

**There is a poll at the bottom to collect some info on if it's a local issue or not**

replies.body: My last 3 games I had an average 48 ping yet I didn't do anything to fix my previous issue. I'm not complaining though.
Glad it went back for you but I'm sadly still sitting 35 ms higher for no real reason from what I can tell.

Heya, it's hard to say what's causing the spike for your specific issue but we can get more info to find out.  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) for these impacted matches to get an overview, and let me know the details and score you received.

We can also get a traceroute to see if there are any snags along the way while reaching the game server.  Download [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/winmtr-v0-92-now-available/) and run a route to the game server: 104.160.131.1.  Run it for about 5 minutes, remove the IP on the first two rows, and let me know what you find.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=klEs7zoG,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-11-18T21:36:59.712+0000)
>
> Heya, it's hard to say what's causing the spike for your specific issue but we can get more info to find out.  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) for these impacted matches to get an overview, and let me know the details and score you received.
> 
> We can also get a traceroute to see if there are any snags along the way while reaching the game server.  Download [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/winmtr-v0-92-now-available/) and run a route to the game server: 104.160.131.1.  Run it for about 5 minutes, remove the IP on the first two rows, and let me know what you find.

I used the Log Reader to check the status of my last game from the night of 11-17-17 and my first game from the morning of 11-18-17.

The **Overall Connection score** for the game on **11-17-17** was 96/100, 42.78ms , 0.11% avg. packet loss and 0.71ms avg. jitter

The **Overall Connection score** for the game on**11-18-17** was 65/100, 115.83ms Avg Latency, 0.31% avg. packet loss and 13.08ms avg. jitter

Hey thanks for the info here.  It looks like your connection to the game server might be unstable and degrading overtime.  Aside from a traceroute, you may want to run over each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to resolve this, and test in a custom game.

Hiya,

So my last game yesterday had:

95
/100 
Avg Latency	45.00 ms
Avg Packet Loss	0.00%
Avg Jitter	1.00 ms

Todays games are giving:



94
/100 
Avg Latency	75.02 ms
Avg Packet Loss	0.99%
Avg Jitter	2.58 ms


Any thoughts?

I know it sucks, but I'm happy to see I'm not the only one that is having this issue.

My first game for the day had my old average 50ms and the log shows it jumps and spikes up shortly after the game and then every game after that stays at the higher ping.  Each game is still scoring over 90, so I've gotta assume that just like the FPS issues this is something on Riots end.

Both NA and LAN servers have jumped 20 ms more since last patch (7.22) and my internet is just fine. Is hard to play like this, I'm not the only one with this trouble, the friends who I play with have the same ping.

Is this going to be fixed soon?
